column1: Uchi////No doubt one of the best sushi spots in Houston
column2: on equal standings with MF Sushi
column3: definitely ranked above Roka Akor. Every piece of sushi we had and every dish we ordered was a work of art and of superb quality (by Houston standards). All the raw items tasted quite fresh
column4: without much of that strong fishy odor
column5: yet still not comparable with the casual sushi restaurants in Japan.
